extensionDescription.message: Preview links, images, or search selected text in a popup window.

closeWhenFocusedInitialWindow.message: Close popup when origin window is focused

tryOpenAtMousePosition.message: Popup at mouse position (disabled — popup at screen center)

disabledUrls.message: Disable on these URLs via plain text, regex, wildcarks, one per line.

sendPageBack.message: Send Page Back to Original Window

enableContainerIdentify.message: Keep open in the same container as original page

modifiedKey.message: Response when selected key is pressing (Please check if it works as expected.)

rememberPopupSizeAndPosition.message: Remember the last popup window size and position.

closedByEsc.message: Esc to close current page (overrides page's default Esc behavior)

dragPx.message: At least move px (do not check if 0):

doubleTapKeyToSendPageBack.message: Double tap specific key to send page back (Please check if it works as expected.)

hoverDisabledUrls.message: Disable on these URLs via plain text, regex, wildcarks, one per line.

triggerAfterDragRelease.message: Trigger after drag is released, no directions check.

previewModeDisabledUrls.message: Disable on these URLs via plain text, regex, wildcarks, one per line.

previewModeEnable.message: Clicking on the link to preview

doubleClickToSwitch.message: Double-click outside images/links to toggle. Resets after page reload or redirect.

doubleClickAsClick.message: Double-click on link to pass through single-click action.

rememberPopupSizeAndPositionForDomain.message: Remember the last popup window size and position for each domain.

note.message: The priority of size/position: domain-specific > non-domain-specific > centered/near mouse.

collectionTooltipsEnable.message: Hover to display collection tooltips. Press Ctrl/Command + U or click the add-on icon to view the collection.
